item.title: AT- Surgical Premium Quality Reusable Washable Incontinence Underpads for Children or Adults
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Pressure redistributing cushion designed to assist in the prevention, treatment and management of pressure ulcers Viscous gel bladder is encased in a fire retardant polyurethane…

The post AT- Surgical Premium Quality Reusable Washable Incontinence Underpads for Children or Adults appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Pressure redistributing cushion designed to assist in the prevention, treatment and management of pressure ulcers
Viscous gel bladder is encased in a fire retardant polyurethane foam shell and provides optimal pressure redistribution, support and comfort
Top of cover is a urethane-coated nylon that is low-shear, vapor permeable and water-resistant. Fire Retardant polyurethane foam shell
Base of cover is waterproof vinyl for durability.Product Dimensions: 18″(L) x 16″(W) x 3″(H). Weight Capacity-Up to 20 inch 275 pounds. 22 inch and up 500 pounds
Removable and replaceable cover has water resistant “Top” and “Non-Slip” vinyl base.
Overall Product Height- 3 inches, Overall Product Length- 18 inches, Overall Product Width- 16 inches, Primary Product Material- Foam.This chair cushion convoluted foam allows passage of air and relief of pressure for long term use

Features:

  • Soft, wick-away material
  • Heavy-duty soaker
  • Uni-shield bearer
  • Seat pad has ties to attach it securely to chair, easy to fix or remove, high resilience.
  • Suitable for kitchen, dining/living room, patio, garden, office, coffee shop and so on.
  • encased in a fire retardant polyurethane foam shell
  • provides optimal pressure redistribution, support and comfort
  • cushion convoluted foam allows passage of air and relief of pressure for long term use

Specifications:

  • Condition: A brand-new, unused, unopened, undamaged item
  • Material:Outer fabric:Polyester, Filling:Sponge
  • Long Term Usable
  • Product DImensions: ‘16X18’

    • Sizes

  • Sizes Available
  • 18 X 20

item.title: Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical's Velcro® Waist Incontinence Pants for adults are a unisex vinyl waterproof shell lined with brush polyester on the interior that slips over incontinence briefs, liners and pads or adult diapers. Great for those seeking solutions to manage incontinence. Incontinence pants act as a barrier that offer an added layer of protection from leaks or accidents, giving the wearer greater confidence and peace of mind.

The post Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• The elastic waistband, adjustable Velcro® closure means these are a snap to pull on
  • Elastic bands are covered with brush polyester to prevent irritation to sensitive skin
  • The generous fit makes these especially comfortable
  • Comes in White or Blue fabric
  • Durable, washable and reusable
  • Hang or lay flat – avoid heat exposure. Do not machine dry or iron

The post Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Reusable Incontinence Underpads
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Save significantly on incontinence care costs. Our reusable underpads draw moisture away from the body and prevent skin irritation. For adults seeking solutions to frequent incontinence problems due to weak or overactive bladders, stop stressful sleepless nights fighting your overactive bladder urges. Sleep better knowing you won't have to get up several times through-out the night to change the sheets. Multiple layers prevent wetness from spreading to the bed - the soft, 3-ply, quilted fabric works much like an egg crate and add a soft layer to firm mattresses.

The post Reusable Incontinence Underpads appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
AT Surgical’s enviornmentally friendly Reusable Underpad is made for durability with a special 3-ply fabric construction:

  • The top outer layer is created with soft wick material for whisking away moisture and assures maximum comfort.
  • The 2nd layer is a heavy-duty soaker with the ability to double it’s weight in absorbency. It’s crafted from a heavy-duty felt material specifically designed for absorbing body fluids.
  • The bottom layer is made from a special Fablon barrier we call Unishield – it is 100% waterproof and will never crack even after 200 washings.

Simply lay one of AT Surgical’s Reusable Underpad Waterproof Mattress Liners on top of the sheets and remove when necessary. It’s also a great alternative to frequent laundry loads and is less wasteful than disposable incontinence products. You can even layer up the Reusable Underpad for additional protection. No matter what stage of life you’re in, our Reusable Underpad mattress protector offers the relief and peace of mind you need.

The post Reusable Incontinence Underpads appeared first on AT Surgical.
